attributes.action: Reduce rate of Fuel Duty to Stimulate UK Economic Growth Post Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Petrol, diesel, biodiesel and bioethanol	57.95 pence per litre
Above Fuel Prices are also subject to VAT at 20%

Average pump price inclusive of VAT for Unleaded Petrol - 120.9 pence per litre

Correct as of 03/01/2019
attributes.background:
The UK fuel duty rate on petrol and diesel of 57.95 pence per litre is an unfair percentage (over 50%) of the total cost of fuel .
Given that lower fuel costs will stimulate the UK economy the government should make consideration to lowering the rate of duty to ensure the UK is secure post brexit.
